body:
Comment 43 by **tashburn**: 
I can't use Go until this issue is fixed, and there are lots of others like me. It will
significantly boost for the adoption of the language to get this done.

I get the impression by "Owner: ----", "Priority-Later", and "Size-XL" that this isn't
slated to get fixed anytime soon... How can we change that? Who is in a position to get
this done?
